song.title: The Saints and the Servants of God
song.lyrics:
[C] The saints and the servants of God, go up to the heavenly throne. With a great song of praise, they rejoice in the Lord who is maker of all.
[V1] I saw the glory of God, shining out in all its power. Endless joy rings out in the new Jerusalem! Holy Lord, Holy Lord!
[V2] I saw the Lamb who was slain, shining brighter than a star. Saviour of the world, He is worthy of all praise! Holy Lord, Holy Lord!
[V3] I saw the Spirit of God, coming from the Father's hand. Light of all our lives, it is sonship that He gives! Holy Lord, Holy Lord!
